divs: Sighting Details1 was on my way home from delivering a customers repaired car in margate 15 miles from my workplace in Deal Kent.As i drove along the Histreet in st Peters,i noticed a cigar shaped object in the sky.It was massive in size,was a burning orange whith a smoke trail in the middle.It was comming down to the ground very slowly.I then lost sight of the object as it dissapeared behind a row of houses in the distance.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Margate
There were no other sightings in Margate on or around October 31st 1998
Summary: I saw a bright burning orange cigar shape with smoke trail from my car winshield.
